title: [Large-scale] Fluid Dynamics Virtual Laboratory Education Program Based on Game Engines

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental fluid mechanics theory and industrial field experience
context.additional_context: Experimental education to enhance digital competencies for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Use a game engine-based virtual lab tool to explain the operating principles of a jet pump
Analyze fluid dynamics problems in real-world industry scenarios (RWS) and propose solutions
Evaluate the applicability of virtual lab results in real work environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
